headline: Assessing Assurant’s (AIZ) Valuation After a Modest Pullback and Ongoing Earnings Growth
summary: Assurant (AIZ) shares have been drifting after a modest pullback this week, even though the business continues to post steady revenue and earnings growth. That disconnect is what makes the stock interesting right now. See our latest analysis for Assurant. Over the past year, Assurant’s share price has ground higher with a year to date share price return of 4.71 percent. Its three year total shareholder return of 80.22 percent shows that longer term momentum is still firmly intact despite the...
